thread.title: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'
thread.title_full: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'

title: AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre'
text: > Entertainment AP PHOTOS: Promoting James Bond from 'Dr. No' to 'Spectre' Christoph Waltz, from left to right, Monica Bellucci, Daniel Craig, Lea Seydoux and Naomie Harris, pose for photographers during the photo call for the latest Bond film, "Spectre," at an hotel in central London, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. The media blitz ahead of Monday's World Premiere of the movie at the Royal Albert Hall has started in earnest. Craig is reprising his role as the British secret agent for the fourth time. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP)
